com.epimorphics.jsonrdf

Class JSONWriterWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.jsonrdf.JSONWriterWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONWriterFacade

    public class JSONWriterWrapper
extends Object
implements JSONWriterFacade
    Wrap up a JSONWriter to (trivially) implement the JSONWriterFacade interface. Allows for streaming pretty printing.
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Dave Reynolds

      • array

        public JSONWriterFacade array()
        Description copied from interface: JSONWriterFacade
        Begin appending a new array. All values until the balancing endArray will be appended to this array. The endArray method must be called to mark the array's end.
        Specified by:
        array in interface JSONWriterFacade
        Returns:
        this

      • endArray

        public JSONWriterFacade endArray()
        Description copied from interface: JSONWriterFacade
        End an array. This method most be called to balance calls to array.
        Specified by:
        endArray in interface JSONWriterFacade
        Returns:
        this

        public JSONWriterFacade endObject()
        Description copied from interface: JSONWriterFacade

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        this

      • key

        public JSONWriterFacade key(String s)
        Description copied from interface: JSONWriterFacade
        Append a key. The key will be associated with the next value. In an object, every value must be preceded by a key.
        Specified by:
        key in interface JSONWriterFacade
        Parameters:
        s - A key string.
        Returns:
        this

      • object

        public JSONWriterFacade object()
        Description copied from interface: JSONWriterFacade
        Begin appending a new object. All keys and values until the balancing endObject will be appended to this object. The endObject method must be called to mark the object's end.
        Specified by:
        object in interface JSONWriterFacade
        Returns:
        this

        public JSONWriterFacade value(Object o)
        Description copied from interface: JSONWriterFacade
        Append an object value.
        Specified by:
        value in interface JSONWriterFacade
        Parameters:
        o - The object to append. It can be null, or a Boolean, Number, String, JSONObject, or JSONArray, or an object with a toJSONString() method.
